title: vEluDanE mayil
sahitya:
vEluDanE mayil mElamar vElan pOl anukUlan bhuvi mIdil Edu


anupallavi

  hAlamuNDu akhila aNDamumE kAtta nIlakaNThan nEya bAla daNDAyudan


caraNam    tiruttaNit-talattilE irundu shirandiDum dEvAdi dEvanAm dIna dayALan
karuttazhiyavE nondu kalangum aDiyArin varuttam ozhiya varam tarum taghaiyALan
